message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that's worth a lot to me, and I think it could be very valuable to you as well. I'm offering it to you for $9,500. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay $9,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,000 is still a bit too low for me. How about we split the difference and go with $9,250? I'm confident this product will be worth it to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm still not able to meet you at $9,250. How about $9,100?
Bob, I'm happy to continue negotiating, but I'm not willing to go lower than $9,150.  This product is truly valuable, and I'm sure you'll see the benefits of having it. Let's make a deal.
I understand your position, Alice. How about $9,100?
